section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ya'qub bin Aws that:a man from among the Companions of the Prophet told him, that when the Messenger of Allah came to Makkah, in the Year of the Conquest, he said: "Indeed, accidental killing on purpose, is killing with a whip or stick, for which forty (she-camels) with their young in their wombs
